oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Adams, Mattie E., 1924 April 18
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A typescript copy of the will of Mattie E. Adams, dated April 18th, 1924. Adams was a resident of Hopkinsville, Christian County, Kentucky at the time of her death. The will was “duly authenticated and exemplified,” before the County Court of Davidson County, Tennessee. Illustrates the first page of the document. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Adams family
